    • Method Detail

      • sendUGCImpressionEvent

        public static void sendUGCImpressionEvent(CurationsFeedItem curationsFeedItem)
        Event should be sent whenever a CurationsFeedItem appears on the screen. Should only be fired once per CurationsFeedItem.
        Parameters:
        curationsFeedItem - CurationsFeedItem that has appeared on screen.

      • sendBvViewGroupAddedToHierarchyEvent

        public static void sendBvViewGroupAddedToHierarchyEvent(java.lang.String externalId,
                                        java.lang.String widgetId,
                                        ReportingGroup reportingGroup)
        Event should be sent whenever a Curations ViewGroup appears on the screen. Should only be fired once per Curations ViewGroup.
        Parameters:
        externalId - If an externalId was used in the CurationsFeedRequest when the Curations feed was loaded, it should be used in this event.
        widgetId - ID given to the Curations ViewGroup used to distinguish events.
        reportingGroup - The type of Curations ViewGroup used to present Curations feed (RecyclerView, ListView ...)

      • sendUsedFeatureEventTapped

        public static void sendUsedFeatureEventTapped(CurationsFeedItem curationsFeedItem)
        Event should be sent whenever a CurationsView is tapped.
        Parameters:
        curationsFeedItem - The CurationsFeedItem used to populate the CurationsView UI

      • sendUsedFeatureEventScrolled

        public static void sendUsedFeatureEventScrolled(java.lang.String externalId,
                                ReportingGroup reportingGroup)
        Should be sent when a ViewGroup displaying Curations feed is scrolled. Typically this is fired once on the first interaction with a UI container and when scrolling stops.
        Parameters:
        externalId - If an externalId was used in the CurationsFeedRequest when the Curations feed was loaded, it should be used in this event.
        reportingGroup - The type of Curations ViewGroup used to present Curations feed (RecyclerView, ListView ...)

      • sendEmbeddedPageView

        public static void sendEmbeddedPageView(java.lang.String externalId,
                        ReportingGroup reportingGroup)
        Event should be sent whenever a Curations ViewGroup is created, but not necessarily displayed on screen.
        Parameters:
        externalId - If an externalId was used in the CurationsFeedRequest when the Curations feed was loaded, it should be used in this event.
        reportingGroup - The type of Curations ViewGroup used to present Curations feed (RecyclerView, ListView ...)
